segments.text: Good afternoon , San Felice Hotel . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'd like to book a room , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . When for , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: March the 23rd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long will you be staying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Three nights .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of room would you like , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Er ... double with bath . I'd appreciate it if you could give me a room with a view over the lake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , madam . I'll just check what we have available . . . Yes , we have a room on the 4th floor with a really splendid view .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . How much is the charge per night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like breakfast ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's eighty four euro per night excluding VAT .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Who's the booking for , please , madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr and Mrs Ryefield , that's R-Y-E-F-I-E-L-D .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , let me make sure I got that
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes it is . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me give you your confirmation number . It's 7576385 . I'll repeat that , 7576385 . Thank you for choosing San Felice Hotel and have a nice day . Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye .
segments.speaker: S2
